net.corda.core.cordapp

Class CordappContext

  • net.corda.core.cordapp.CordappContext

  • public class CordappContext

    An app context provides information about where an app was loaded from, access to its classloader, and (in the included interface Cordapp object) lists of annotated classes discovered via scanning the JAR.

    A CordappContext is obtained from CordappProvider.getAppContext which resides on a ServiceHub. This will be used primarily from within flows.

    See Also:
    interface Cordapp, CordappProvider.getAppContext, ServiceHub
